creditline: Gift of Stephen Addiss and Audrey Yoshiko Seo
description: each panel framed in gilt; connected, looping calligraphy with three columns per panel, with left-most panel having two columns; two square red seals below calligraphy on left-most panel and smaller red square seals on the LL side of the second panel from the left; second panel from left has a short line of small characters at left edge next to red seals
title: The Old Drunkard's Pavillion
